thread.title: Jacqui Worsdell

author: Jacqui Worsdell
title: Jacqui Worsdell
text:
Great blinds, amazing value and purfect delivery,
I have just moved house and needed something for the windows that were cost effective, yet functional and look nice! That was a tall order on my budget, untill I found Blinds to go. Even the fitting instructions were excellent and I installed the blinds myself, it was nice to have the samples to make sure that the colour would look nice in the rooms and these arrived within a day or so.My only worry was on the website and I paniced that I would make a mistake on the order as the request to change the tilt /rise appeared lower down the page and I almost missed it. Exceptional quality and service, I would definately recommend to others and have already done so.
